titleStmt.title: OBSERVATION ON THE WORKS of NATURE.
titleStmt.author: Elizabeth Hands (née Herbert)

bibl.title: OBSERVATION ON THE WORKS of NATURE.
bibl.author: Elizabeth Hands (née Herbert)

front.head: OBSERVATION ON THE WORKS of NATURE.

lg.l: night submits to the encroaching day,
And groves, and fields, put on their spring array;
Now various flowers of various hues display'd,
Adorn the green, or deck the lonely shade.
These show the pow'r of the Almighty's hand;
They spring, they blow, they sade at his command:
United Nature does his word fulfil,
'Tis Man alone rejects his Maker's will.
